title: @Riot RP Promotion
body: I just want to know when the promotion starts. It says the 12th, but at what hour in which timezone? Don't want to put my RP in too early and have to contact support because of timezones.

replies.body:
Cause that is totally helpful >.>

As a note, i'm not sure when it starts, but if your worried, just put your money in the next day.
